    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int SIZE_PIXEL_BY_SIZE_UNIT
      Size in pixel by size unit (real size for one map case, instead of HEXAGON_UNIT_PAINT_RADIUS which is only for painting)
